scripts.start: npm run-script download-groups && node src/index.js open-data-produced-by-clarity groups-template
scripts.process-groups: node src/index.js open-data-produced-by-clarity groups-template && node src/index.js non-open-data-produced-by-clarity groups-template && node src/index.js open-data-used-by-clarity groups-template && node src/index.js non-open-data-used-by-clarity groups-template
scripts.process-organizations: node src/index.js clarity organizations-template && node src/index.js dc1 organizations-template && node src/index.js dc2 organizations-template && node src/index.js dc3 organizations-template && node src/index.js dc4 organizations-template
